ygData.subject: Re: Pottery NERFed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Remember the good old days back when patches used to help players and fix problems instead of cause them?  What ever happened to those days? =)
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:14 AM 07/27/1999 EDT, you wrote:
>From: BobbiS7@...
>
>Howdy folks
>
>Okay - it is the buzz that like Brewing, making Platinum profits for
>selling Pie Tins will be nerfed soon (tonight?).
>This is not a good sign for potter/bakers now that dough is fixed.
>I understand the whole Verant screws with EQ Players rant.
>
>Now /roleplay on
>
>If making ceramic linings stays equally cheap, would
>smithing the Pie/Bread/Muffin Tins get around the
>whole problem of expensive sketches?
>
>Cleric Taven


Remember the good old days back when patches used to help players and fix
problems instead of cause them? What ever happened to those days? =)

-Pennaggolan
